attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2013-0356

Date: 2013-03-28

Whereas the Administrator of the Government of Ontario, the Honourable Warren K. Winkler, Chief Justice of Ontario, will be unable to act from April 8 to April 11, 2013, inclusive, from May 8 to May 10, 2013, inclusive, from May 16 to May 24, 2013, inclusive, from May 30 to June 1, 2013, inclusive, from June 5 to June 7, 2013, inclusive, and from June 13 to June 15, 2013, inclusive, and it is therefore necessary that other persons be appointed Administrator for these periods;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Canadian Heritage, pursuant to section 67 of the Constitution Act, 1867,

 

(a) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Warren K. Winkler as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective April 8, 2013;

 

(b) appoints the Honourable Robert J. Sharpe to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, effective April 8, 2013;

 

(c) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Robert J. Sharpe as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective April 12, 2013;

 

(d) appoints the Honourable Warren K. Winkler to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, on April 12, 2013;

 

…/2

 


- 2 -

 

(e) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Warren K. Winkler as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective May 8, 2013;

 

(f) appoints the Honourable Marc Rosenberg to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, effective May 8, 2013;

 

(g) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Marc Rosenberg as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective May 11, 2013;

 

(h) appoints the Honourable Warren K. Winkler to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, effective May 11, 2013;

 

(i) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Warren K. Winkler as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective May 16, 2013;

 

(j) appoints the Honourable Heather J. Smith to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, effective May 16, 2013;

 

(k) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Heather J. Smith as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective May 25, 2013;

 

(l) appoints the Honourable Warren K. Winkler to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, effective May 25, 2013;

 

…/3

 


- 3 -

 

(m) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Warren K. Winkler as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective May 30, 2013;

 

(n) appoints the Honourable Heather J. Smith to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, effective May 30, 2013;

 

(o) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Heather J. Smith as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective June 2, 2013;

 

(p) appoints the Honourable Warren K. Winkler to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, effective June 2, 2013;

 

(q) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Warren K. Winkler as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective June 5, 2013;

 

(r) appoints the Honourable Robert J. Sharpe to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, on June 5, 2013;

 

(s) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Robert J. Sharpe as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective June 8, 2013;

 

(t) appoints the Honourable Warren K. Winkler to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, effective June 8, 2013;

 

…/4

 


- 4 -

 

(u) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Warren K. Winkler as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective June 13, 2013;

 

(v) appoints the Honourable Robert J. Sharpe to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, effective June 13, 2013;

 

(w) terminates the appointment of the Honourable Robert J. Sharpe as Administrator of the Government of Ontario, effective June 16, 2013; and

 

(x) appoints the Honourable Warren K. Winkler to be Administrator of the Government of Ontario, to execute the office and functions of the Lieutenant Governor of Ontario during the absence, illness or other inability of the Lieutenant Governor, effective June 16, 2013.

 

 

 


Attendu que l’administrateur du gouvernement de l’Ontario, l’honorable Warren K. Winkler, juge en chef de l’Ontario, ne sera pas en mesure de remplir ses fonctions du 8 au 11 avril 2013, du 8 au 10 mai 2013, du 16 au 24 mai 2013, du 30 mai au 1er juin 2013, du 5 au 7 juin 2013 et du 13 au 15 juin 2013 et qu’il est donc nécessaire que d’autres personnes soient nommées administrateurs pour ces périodes,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre du Patrimoine canadien et en vertu de l’article 67 de la Loi constitutionnelle de 1867, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil :

 

a) met fin à la nomination de l’honorable Warren K. Winkler au poste d’administrateur du gouvernement de l’Ontario, avec prise d’effet le 8 avril 2013;

 

b) nomme l’honorable Robert J. Sharpe à titre d’administrateur du gouvernement de l’Ontario afin qu’il remplisse les fonctions de lieutenant-gouverneur de l’Ontario durant l’absence, la maladie ou autre incapacité de ce dernier, avec prise d’effet le 8 avril 2013;

 

c) met fin à la nomination de l’honorable Robert J. Sharpe au poste d’administrateur du gouvernement de l’Ontario, avec prise d’effet le 12 avril 2013;

 

d) nomme l’honorable Warren K. Winkler à titre d’administrateur du gouvernement de l’Ontario afin qu’il remplisse les fonctions de lieutenant-gouverneur de l’Ontario durant l’absence, la maladie ou autre incapacité de ce dernier, avec prise d’effet le 12 avril 2013;

 

 

 

…/2

 


- 2 -
